channel.title: Coverage on Jeroen Mols
channel.description: Recent content in Coverage on Jeroen Mols

item.title: The 100% code coverage problem
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: While you may be tempted to strive for 100% code coverage, that would be a horrible idea. Besides some code being hard to test, the concept of coverage is actually fundamentally limited.

item.title: Level up GitHub builds with CI and code coverage
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Wouldn’t you love to have your open source projects built automatically by a continuous integration server? And to have a detailed code coverage report for all your unit tests?
